Danger signs in children (BOX)
✱  Inability to breastfeed or drink fluids  
✱  High fever
✱  Fast and difficult breathing
✱  Persistent vomiting
✱  Excessive sleepiness
✱  Blood in stools
✱  Convulsions
FEVER CAUSED BY INSECT BITES
Insects such as mosquitoes and sand flies can transmit many serious diseases 
between human beings and from animals to humans. Some of the common diseases transmitted by insects are described below:   
Malaria
Malaria is spread by the bite of a mosquito.
